com.viaoa.util

Class OAXMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.util.OAXMLWriter

  • public class OAXMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    OAXMLWriter creates an XML file that can then be read using an OAXMLReader.
    If an object has already been stored in the file, then its key will be stored.
    See Also:
    OAXMLReader

        public int shouldWriteProperty(java.lang.Object obj,
                      java.lang.String propertyName,

        called by OAObject.write to know if object should be written for a property that references another OAObject. This can be overwritten to control which properties are saved. default: if o default = WRITE_YES;

      • setEncodeMessage

        public void setEncodeMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Used to encrypt all data.

        NOTE: currently only works with printCDATA. This needs to be changed so that all printXX methods encrypt data.

        See Also:
        OAXMLReader.setDecodeMessage(java.lang.String)
